short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters out Starbucks, Dunkin', and McDonald's from Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever find yourself frustrated with the overwhelming amount of coffee chain locations on Google Maps? Our new extension can help you personalize your map view by removing Starbucks, Dunkin', and McDonald's, giving you a more tailored experience.

Whether you're health-conscious and want to limit your fast food intake or simply prefer to support local businesses, our extension makes it easy to find alternative options for food and drink. You'll be able to discover new and exciting places in your local area, all while supporting healthier and more sustainable lifestyle choices.

Our extension is incredibly easy to use and can be installed in just a few clicks. 

So why settle for a generic map view when you can customize it to fit your unique preferences and needs? Download our extension now and start exploring the world around you on your own terms!
